attributes.action: STOP PRICING US OFF THE ROADS!
attributes.additional_details: Please help keep motorists on the road, the Government will lose out because the more folk that give up the car the more road tax you will lose. This is not an option for some of us mere mortals, Insurance Companies are getting greedy and need putting in their place. Stop penalising good drivers to pay for bad drivers!
attributes.background: Every responsible driver is being penalised for all the bad drivers out there. It's time to stop innocent folks from paying the price. Insurance companies have been upping their prices and giving ridiculous excuses for doing so, the time has come to get the law on our side and stop this practice!
